features: ✅ TONER AND ESSENCE BOTH AT ONCE. Instead of a toner that is as dry as water, it contains active ingredients that can help soothe skin problems. Not only does it serve as a toner, but it also helps in clearing up troubles with just one layer applied.
✅ SKIN MOISTURE REPLENISHMENT. The watery toner contains PHYTOMACY A, an active ingredient that helps clear up troubles, and replenishes moisture to dry skin immediately after cleansing.
✅ SKIN SOOTHING EFFECT. This product is suitable for all skin types, including oily, troubled, and sensitive skin, and it soothes red skin caused by dry skin or external stimuli.

✅ TEA-TREE 4-TERPINEOL. This product contains four plant extracts (White willow bark, Brussels sprout, Broccoli, and Plum) that help activate the main ingredients and maximize synergistic effects in skin care and soothing.

✅RECOMMENDED FOR. Suitable for those who experience severe dryness when using only toner, or who are looking for a toner product that can be used safely on troubled skin, or who are looking for a mild toner that does not irritate and burden the skin even after long-term use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No more ineffective Toner just like water! Everyone has a different skin type. why do you use the same toner as others?Troubled skin has to be different from the first step of skincare. Instead of dry skin with water-type toner, we make it in combination with Toner(effects trouble soothing with activated ingredients) + Essence(helps trouble clearing and hydrating the skin)Reduce the irritation / Remove the dead skin cell / Recharge the moisturizing Now, Use products that are effective for your red acne-pron skin type!

2 KEEP SKIN CARE EFFECTS Troubless Mild Clear Toner Essence clears and soothes troubled skin while moisturizing. Offers 2 KEEP CARE EFFECTS. Key ingredients for trouble ●4-Terpineol 10,000ppm ●Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract ●Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract ●Prunus Mume Fruit Extract 10 KINDS HYDRATING BALANCE Mild Clear Toner Essence contains 10 hyaluronic acid ingredients to deeply moisturize the skin. Removes excess oil and balances skin moisture. 25.6% SEBUM DECREASING After a 4-week trial, sebum reduction of -25.6% was proven. Non-comedogenic, safe for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toner for those who have sensitive or problematic skin. It is a large bottle and easy to use. There is a light scent but it dissipates once applied. It applies to the skin well and helps to clear up dry patches and breakouts. No unwanted reactions or feeling left on your skin after use. Very easy to work into your face care routine and it works well with other products. I feel that it is well priced for what you get as this bottle will last a long time. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like a spa
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner. It smells like something they would use at the spa. It's easy to use. I just wash my face and then apply this toner with a cotton ball. My face feels fresh after I use it. A lot of times, when using the toner, the cotton ball shows dirt and makeup that my cleanser didn't pick up.I'm 100% happy with this toner and will continue using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light smell, nice toner
reviews.reviewText: My daughter uses this toner nightly in her face routine. She has fairly sensitive skin and this doesn't bother her at all. There's a light scent that doesn't stick around. It's a little pricy, but if it works for her and her sensitive skin, I think it's wroth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freshness in a Bottle
reviews.reviewText: That's the best way I can describe the scent in this not-so-little bottle of toner. This stuff is great! It smells clean, soaks in fast and leaves the skin feeling like you just left a professional spa and they took extra good care of youIt moisturizes super well and as someone with sensitive skin, it doesn't irritate me one bit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely light scent and no sting
reviews.reviewText: I am really enjoying this toner. There is just a hint of a scent so nothing over powering, which I like, as many toners have such a sharp, alcohol smell to them and can be irritating. There is no sting when applying and I have been using it after a cleanser and many times i just rock the toner through the day and at night after washing my face I follow it up with my night time moisturizer. It leaves my skin smooth and very clean feeling which for me with my combination skin is a huge plus, and it leaves me with a nice refreshed feeling. I have some really dry spots on my forehead and this seems to have really helped with extra hydration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very mild, very low scent
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this toner for about a week and a half. It's very mild, and I have not had any skin sensitivity, breakouts, redness, etc. Yay!This toner is watery, with low non-offensive scent. It's not quite 'no scent', but there aren't any weird chemical, artificial or strong odors.The bottle is plastic, but you can squeeze it just a little to administer the product. Ofc, if you squeeze too hard, it goes all over. That only happened once when I was not paying attention.All-in-all, I'm really happy with this toner. It's exactly what I've veen looking for (I used to use Muji's mild toner, but its too hard to get now). I will purchase this one again in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No irritation, subtle fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something that wasn’t harsh or strong smelling for my occasional acne that usually pops up right around that time of the month.I now have been using this before going to bed. I apply with a reusable microfiber cotton round.I have very sensitive skin and also sensitive to certain smells. Straight up tea tree oil is strong so I was nervous that this was going to be very potent smelling. It has a very subtle scent that dissipates quickly.No irritation and doesn’t dry out my skin. I follow up with a light coating of moisturizer.Very happy with his toner so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft light scent toner, works on sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This skin toner has a soft light scent and made in Korea. I have sensitive t- zone combo skin. I break out around my nose, chin and forehead. Lots of blackheads, whiteheads and redness. I needed something that would sooth my skin from breakout. I used this toner after using adapalene face wash. This toner didn't irritate my skin and removed some left over dirt that the face wash didn't get. My face didn't feel tight after use, and felt clean. I will have to use for a couple to weeks to see if this toner works, but so far so good, I have used it morning and night.
